director.name: 埃德沃德·迈布里奇 Eadweard Muybridge

introduction: Series photography dating from 1877-1885, put together for a special screening at the University Of Southern California by one David Hanson, and subsequently released on DVD by Kino Video (Kino International) in 1994. The sections edited together by Hanson are as follows: Woman Turning And Walking Upstairs Woman Walking Downstairs Woman Setting Down Jug Woman Picking Up Skirt Woman Picking UP Child Woman Pouring From Jug WomanThrowing Baseball Woman Jumping From Rock To Rock Woman Hopping On One Foot Woman Sitting Down It is part of Kino's "The Movies Begin" series/box set (located on "Volume One: The Great Train Robbery And Other Primary Works."
